import os

    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.bcd45f0c:
for col in cat_cols:
    fig,ax=plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(8,4))
    sns.countplot(y=tel[col],ax=ax[0],palette="Set2")
    sns.countplot(y=tel[col],hue=tel.churn,ax=ax[1],palette="Set2")
    plt.tight_layout()
source.ad610209:
for col in num_cols:

    fig,ax=plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(8,4))

    sns.kdeplot(x=tel[col],data=tel,ax=ax[0])
    sns.kdeplot(x=tel[col],hue="churn",data=tel,ax=ax[1])
    plt.tight_layout()
